name: HD Ticket Report
query:
SELECT
    hd.name AS "Ticket No:Link/HD Ticket:150",
    hd.status AS "Status:Data:120",
    hd.custom_circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:150",
    hd.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
    hd.custom_site_type AS "Site Type:Data:150",
    hd.custom_impact AS "Impact:Data:150",
    hd.custom_ticket_category AS "Ticket Category:Data:180",
    hd.custom_ticket_sub_category AS "Ticket Sub Category:Data:200",
    hd.priority AS "Priority:Data:100",
    rca.rca AS "RCA:Data:250",
    hd.custom_agent AS "Agent:Data:150",
    hd.custom_stage AS "Agent Stage:Data:150",
    hd.custom_on_hold_reason AS "On Hold Reason:Data:200",
    hd.ticket_type AS "Ticket Type:Data:150",
    hd.raised_by AS "Raised By:Data:150",
    hd.custom_channel AS "Channel:Data:150",
    hd.subject AS "Subject:Data:250",
    hd.response_by AS "Response By:Datetime:150",
    hd.resolution_by AS "Resolution By:Datetime:150",
    hd.resolution_date AS "Resolution Datetime:Datetime:150",
    hd.custom_agent_responded_on AS "Agent Responded On:Datetime:150",
    hd.custom_close_datetime AS "Close Datetime:Datetime:150",
    hd.creation AS "Ticket Created Datetime:Datetime:150",
    LEFT(MONTHNAME(hd.creation), 3) AS "Month Ticket Created:Data:80",

    -- In-house Escalation fields
    esc.task_type AS "Task Type:Data:150",
    esc.department AS "Department:Data:150",
    esc.task_subject AS "Task Subject:Data:250",
    esc.task_priority AS "Task Priority:Data:100",
    esc.task_id AS "Task ID:Data:150",
    esc.partner AS "Partner:Data:150",
    esc.support_mode AS "Support Mode:Data:150",
    esc.partner_ticket_number AS "Partner Ticket Number:Data:150",
    esc.task_status AS "Task Status:Data:120",
    esc.expected_start_date AS "Expected Start Date:Datetime:150",
    esc.expected_end_date AS "Expected End Date:Datetime:150",
    esc.completed_datetime AS "Completed Datetime:Datetime:150",
    esc.partner_ticket_log_date AS "Partner Ticket Log Date:Datetime:150"

FROM
    `tabHD Ticket` hd
LEFT JOIN `tabRCA` rca
    ON rca.parent = hd.name
   AND rca.parenttype = 'HD Ticket'
   AND rca.parentfield = 'custom_rca'

LEFT JOIN `tabIn-house Escalation` esc
    ON esc.parent = hd.name
   AND esc.parenttype = 'HD Ticket'
   AND esc.parentfield = 'custom_inhouse_eaclation'

WHERE
    hd.creation >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH)

ORDER BY
    hd.creation DESC;
